entries.name: new(source)
entries.desc: Create an AttlistDecl, pulling the information from a Source.  Notice that this isn't very convenient; to create an AttlistDecl, you basically have to format it yourself, and then have the initializer parse it. Sorry, but for the foreseeable future, DTD support in REXML is pretty weak on convenience.  Have I mentioned how much I hate DTDs?

entries.name: include?(key)
entries.desc: Whether an attlist declaration includes the given attribute definition

entries.name: write(out, indent=-1)
entries.desc: Write out exactly what we got in.
